attributes.action: Reduce Middle Eastern Oil Imports buy investing in electric transportation vehicles in public transport
attributes.additional_details: In order to solve the problem with the Middle East, increase the use of electric/hybrid vehicles used in public transport, and encourage more people to use them in order to reduce the use of cars, and thus reducing our dependencies on oil. Also build more nuclear power stations to meet the electrical needs.

rejection.details: The petition expresses a call for greater use of electric vehicles, but does not set out what precisely the Government should be doing to help to deliver this.
